org.apache.camel.component.direct

Class DirectEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.camel.support.ServiceSupport
      • org.apache.camel.impl.DefaultEndpoint
        • org.apache.camel.component.direct.DirectEndpoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CamelContextAware, Endpoint, IsSingleton, Service, ShutdownableService, HasId, StatefulService, SuspendableService

    @UriEndpoint(scheme="direct",
             title="Direct",
             syntax="direct:name",
             consumerClass=DirectConsumer.class,
             label="core,endpoint")
public class DirectEndpoint
extends DefaultEndpoint
    The direct component provides direct, synchronous call to another endpoint from the same CamelContext. This endpoint can be used to connect existing routes in the same CamelContext.
